jobName.description: Name for the job, need to be unique

image.description: URL pointing to the Docker image for all tasks in the job

authFile.description: Docker registry authentication file existing on HDFS

dataDir.description:
Data directory existing on HDFS.
Full HDFS path will be exported as an environment variable $PAI_DATA_DIR.

outputDir.description:
Output directory on HDFS, $PAI_DEFAULT_FS_URI/Output/$jobName will be used if not specified.
Full HDFS path will be exported as an environment variable $PAI_OUTPUT_DIR.

codeDir.description:
Code directory existing on HDFS.
Full HDFS path will be exported as an environment variable $PAI_CODE_DIR.

virtualCluster.description: The virtual cluster job runs on. If omitted, the job will run on default virtual cluster

taskRoles.description: List of taskRole, one task role at least

name.description: Name for the task role, need to be unique with other roles

taskNumber.description: Number of tasks for the task role, no less than 1

cpuNumber.description: CPU number for one task in the task role, no less than 1

memoryMB.description: Memory for one task in the task role, no less than 100

shmMB.description: Shared memory for one task in the task role, no more than memory size. The default value is 64MB

gpuNumber.description: GPU number for one task in the task role, no less than 0

label.description: Label name for the port type

beginAt.description: The port to begin with in the port type, 0 for random selection

portNumber.description: Number of ports for the specific type

command.description:
Executable command for tasks in the task role, can not be empty
** PLEASE CHANGE MANUALLY **

minFailedTaskCount.description: Number of failed tasks to kill the entire job, null or no less than 1

minSucceededTaskCount.description: Number of succeeded tasks to kill the entire job, null or no less than 1

gpuType.description: Specify the GPU type to be used in the tasks. If omitted, the job will run on any gpu type

retryCount.description: Job retry count, no less than 0

jobEnvs.description: Job env parameters, key-value pairs, available in job container and no substitution allowed
